item.title: Black Ops 6 Zombies: Potential Rewards for the Super Easter Egg
item.description:
Super Easter Eggs have been a staple of Call of Duty Zombies for years, and Black Ops 6 certainly wouldn't feel complete without one. While previous rewards have been an extra weapon at spawn, Black Ops 6 could be the perfect opportunity to surprise players through their hard work and dedication to the mode outside of Warzone and Multiplayer. Below, players can find a list of potential rewards for the Super Easter Egg in Black Ops 6 Zombies , ensuring that dedication is deeply rewarded with the right tools to proceed.

Check out our comprehensive guides for every Black Ops 6 Zombies easter egg if you're interested in completing them yourself:

Liberty Falls Main Quest

Terminus Main Quest

Citadelle des Morts Main Quest

The Tomb Main Quest

Shattered Veil Main Quest

Reckoning Main Quest

Eddie Richtofen as an Operator

An Exclusive Reward so Players Can Experience the Face and Voice of COD Zombies

Richtofen has been at the front of every COD Zombies title, leading the charge with his insanity in World at War , all throughout the multiverse. Despite the love everyone has for the Ultimis and Primis counterparts of Richtofen, it's only Eddie Richtofen that remains (for now) in the singular universe. With Eddie controlling the strings of Janus and even manipulating the former members of Requim, why not give the fans what they've always wanted, which is Nolan North's Edward Richtofen as an Operator for them to use in Warzone, Multiplayer, and Zombies? It shows commitment to the easter eggs with something they can actually show for it.

Purchasable Golden Armor

Golden Armor is the Best Upgrade for Greater Durability

Golden Armor is strangely only available in The Tomb through a rather difficult easter egg to complete, which is why it would be nice to get Golden Armor across all maps through the simple process of having completed all easter eggs across every map. It's a simple reward, but still a nice one. Allowing players to purchase Gold Armor as long as someone in the lobby has the easter eggs completed will encourage deeper gameplay and attempts at high rounds, since Gold Armor is so great and durable.

An Automatically Upgraded & Pack-a-Punched Custom Weapon

Providing Players with a Starting Weapon That's Upgraded to the Maximum is Unbeatable

Being able to bring a weapon of your choice into a map, equipped fully with customization and attachments, is one that provides players with a powerful change from the classic formula. However, this shouldn't be changed, but instead, encouraged. Imagine how powerful players would feel if they jumped into every single map after the super easter egg, only for their primary weapon to be fully upgraded as Legendary tier with potentially a Tier 3 Pack-a-Punch. It would save players a lot of Salvage, Essence, and certainly provides them with a one-shot kill weapon for many rounds to come.

All Wonder Weapons in Every Map

An Abundance of Wonder Weapons Allows for Creative Changes

Each map has its own Wonder Weapon, but wouldn't it be more fun if these maps had every single Wonder Weapon? The Ray Gun and the Ray Gun Mk2 are the only 2 Wonder Weapons that consistently appear on each map, but there's so much more potential for boss fights and high round runs if players hit the Mystery Box and can pull the Jet Gun on Terminus, or one of the Elemental Swords in Reckoning, and so on. Providing players with every Wonder Weapon really does bring new changes to familiar maps.

Permanent Perkaholic on Round 1

Claiming All Perks is a Grateful Reward

Perkaholic is one of the most beloved GobbleGums, but why not provide players with a permanent one for their first life? It would be great if players received an easter egg similar to that of Moon, in which players will always have their Perks, even after they need to be revived. If Treyarch isn't willing to give players a permanent selection of all Perks, then it would at least be nice to spawn in with a bunch, or all, and lose them if you go down. It would feel satisfying and like you've actually earned something if you manage to spawn each map with a bunch of freebies.

Pack-a-Punch Camos

Exclusive Camos to Bring Into Warzone and Multiplayer

Each map has its own exclusive Pack-a-Punch camo, which changes color from Tier 1 to Tier 3 upgrades. With these Pack-a-Punch camos, players always have a unique visual skin for their weapons, but it would be nice if these camos were rewarded to players outside of Zombies. Bringing in these colorful camo variants for Warzone and Multiplayer allows players to represent their commitment to Zombies, even if it's not the most satisfying reward to obtain.

Exclusive Mule Kick with a Bonus Ray Gun

A Unique Perk and Starting Reward

One of the rewards players could obtain would be more unique to them than other players. Spawning in with a permanent Mule Kick means players have a perk that can't be obtained through a simple drink, but instead, through a multitude of easter eggs. Mule Kick would mean that players can have 3 guns, which would bode well when there are so many Wonder Weapons. If Treyarch is feeling even more generous, then that third gun slot could belong to a Ray Gun, ensuring Round 1 is a breeze, and one of confidence and gloating.

An Exclusive Classic Map

Giving Players an Old Map Rewards Loyalty with Nostalgia

A potential reward that's very unlikely, but would certainly reward players for their efforts, is a secret map, one that only they can play. It gives other players a reason to play more Zombies and complete the extensive easter eggs that the developers have worked so hard to make, so that everyone can experience them, and those who have worked hard can reap the rewards with a new map. This map could easily reward loyal players with a classic layout familiar to players, whether it's Nacht der Untoten or Der Riese, any simple map from the old era that would be easier to replicate, and always fun to play.

Your comment has not been saved

item.title: Galaxy Defense Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Galaxy Defense Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Galaxy Defense
  • How to Get More Galaxy Defense Codes

Galaxy Defense is a strategy tower defense game where you will need to protect the Earth from the fall of various types of asteroids. To handle it, you'll have a bunch of weapons in your arsenal that you can unlock and use over the game, ranging from machine guns to huge deadly lasers.

To unlock the best weapons faster, you'll need to earn a lot of Diamonds and accumulate other resources for upgrades. Luckily, you can get much closer to your goal by redeeming Galaxy Defense codes, which will bring you a bunch of rewards that will definitely come in handy.

Updated August 16, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are several codes available right now, offering a mix of rewards like Diamonds, Stamina, and Enhanced Alloys. Each code gives something that can help improve your progress. Keep track of the rewards and redeem them while they’re active. This guide is updated regularly, so it’s worth checking back for any new additions.

All Galaxy Defense Codes

Working Galaxy Defense Codes

  • GDLO100K - Redeem this code to get rewards. (NEW)
  • GDV7VY - Redeem this code to get Enhanced Alloys.
  • GDV7HL - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds.
  • GDFUN - Redeem this code to get 100 Stamina.
  • GDLUCK - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds.

Expired Galaxy Defense Codes

  • GDV10LF - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV10UZ - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • 90KCHAT - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV9VP - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV9WV - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV9RK - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDHN80K - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDN70K - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDC60K - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV8LH - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV8NC - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV81S - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV82O - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV83R - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV84R - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV85Y - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV6VM - Redeem this code to get six Etching Solvents.
  • GDV6HU - Redeem this code to get five Warrior Chest Keys.

Redeeming Galaxy Defense codes is a quick and convenient way to get rare resources and premium currency. So, if you don't want to spend a lot of time grinding or real money to get these rare items, be sure to redeem Galaxy Defense codes.

How to Redeem Codes for Galaxy Defense

Redemption of Galaxy Defense codes will be accessible as soon as you complete your first training match. From there, you can easily redeem your rewards with just a few clicks, and here's how to do it in this free mobile game:

  • Launch Galaxy Defense .
  • Go to the main menu.
  • Pay attention to the upper-left corner of the screen. There will be your avatar. Click on it.
  • This will open the Profile and Settings menu. Here, in the lower part of the menu, you will find the redemption section, which contains an input field and a yellow Exchange button below it. Now, in the input field, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes.
  • Lastly, click on the yellow Exchange button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards you have received.

How to Get More Galaxy Defense Codes

You can always come back to this page for the latest Galaxy Defense codes, so bookmark it. Also, you can visit the official Galaxy Defense Discord server. Developers often share codes for this mobile game there, so just be careful not to miss them among other messages and announcements.

Galaxy Defense is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Driving Empire Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Driving Empire Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Driving Empire
  • How to Play Driving Empire
  • The Best Roblox Racing Games Like Driving Empire
  • About the Driving Empire Developers

For Roblox players who cannot afford to buy themselves a new in-game car, there are Driving Empire codes that offer cash as a free reward. All of these active and expired codes can be found listed below. In addition, fans of the game will find step-by-step instructions on how to redeem Driving Empire codes here, along with a guide on how to play the popular Roblox game.

Updated August 16, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are several active codes right now, each offering different kinds of rewards such as cars, trophies, tuning kits, and cash. You can redeem them all to expand your collection and pick up some useful extras along the way. Since codes don’t last forever, it’s worth claiming them before they expire. More rewards may arrive in future updates, so make sure to check back here from time to time.

Codes Checked on August 16, 2025.

Driving Empire Codes

All Working Driving Empire Codes

  • 2MLIKES - Claim code for 2017 Nissan GT-R (NEW)
  • BADGUYS2 - Claim code for Betty Beater
  • NASCAR100M - Claim code for 200 Trophies
  • CUSTOMIZATION2025 - Claim code for 10 Tuning Kits
  • 200KMEMBERS - Claim code for 75k Cash
  • NEWYEAR2025 - Claim code for 75k Cash
  • ZOOM - Claim code for 2023 Fairway Zoomer

All Expired Driving Empire Codes

  • 700MV1SITS - Claim code for 50k Cash

  • CHARGEDUP - Claim code for 2020 Dodged FastCat
  • BACK2SKOOL - Claim code for 75K Cash
  • ROBLOX - Claim code for Roblox Rim
  • Cameras - Claim code for a 2020 Chevey Camera S Car
  • SUMM3R - Claim code for a 2016 Portch Rover Car

  • SRY4D3L4Y - Claim code for Cash
  • C4N4D4 - Claim code for Canada Day Wrap
  • MEMBERS - Claim code for Cash
  • VALENTINES - Claim code for Cash
  • EMPIRE - Claim code for Cash
  • SPR1NGT1ME - Claim code for Cash
  • BIRD100K - Claim code for Rewards
  • HNY22 - Claim code for Cash
  • 400KMEMBERS - Claim code for Cash
  • OopsMyBadLol - Claim code for Cash
  • THANKS150M - Claim code for Cash
  • BURRITO - Claim code for Cash
  • COMMUNITY - Claim code for Cash
  • 100MVISITS - Claim code for Cash
  • 90MVISITS - Claim code for Cash
  • COMMUNITY - Claim code for Cash
  • SPR1NG - Claim code for Grass & Flower Vehicle Wraps

  • SUPPORT - Claim code for Cash

  • HNY2021 - Claim code for Cash and gifts
  • W1NT3R - Claim code for Limited Vehicle Wrap

How to Redeem Codes in Driving Empire

Like with many other Roblox games, Driving Empire codes are available for everyone. To redeem them, players need only follow the straightforward steps below to claim their free rewards:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Driving Empire.
  2. Look in the bottom left corner and press the Settings button here.
  3. From here, go into the Codes tab and insert the code into the text box.
  4. Once done, press Submit and claim rewards.

Codes can only be redeemed once per account. That said, players can claim the same code on multiple accounts.

How to Play Driving Empire

Playing Driving Empire is very simple and fun. To begin with, after the player has appeared in the world, they'll need to choose a car. There are many real-world cars in the game and each of them has its own characteristics, but only two cars will be available at first. To earn money, players have to drive, drift, and participate in races. For the money earned, players can buy a new car or motorbike. With the Driving Empire codes in this article, Roblox players can buy new vehicles even faster.

The Best Roblox Racing Games Like Driving Empire

There are a lot of Roblox games with the theme of racing and cars in general, and among them are plenty of good ones that offer an interesting gaming experience. In this article, players will find the best games like Driving Empire :

  • Car Dealership Tycoon
  • Drive World
  • Southwest Florida
  • Vehicle Legends
  • Ultimate Driving

About the Driving Empire Developers

Driving Empire was created by a group of developers who call themselves Voldex. Although they have released one game so far, their Roblox group already has 2 million members.

item.title: Roblox: UGC Limited Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
UGC Limited is one of the few Roblox experiences that is not just a game for your entertainment, but a useful tool for marketing and sharing your creativity. Here, Roblox creators can generate their own codes that other players can redeem to get access to specific, limited-edition items.

We, in turn, have collected some cool UGC Limited codes that you can use to buy new cosmetic items. So, if you want to change your image but want more unique and rare things, this is one of the best options.

Updated August 16, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are plenty of active codes for UGC Limited right now, and each one unlocks different cosmetic rewards to customize your look. From hats and horns to weapons and accessories, there’s a wide variety of items you can claim. Since these rewards don’t affect gameplay, they’re all about adding some extra personality to your style. Be sure to check back often, as more themed cosmetics may appear in future updates.

All UGC Limited Codes

Working UGC Limited Codes

  • 88 - Redeem this code to get Chicken Hat. (NEW)
  • 801 - Redeem this code to get a Black Horn.
  • Sofa0 - Redeem this code to get Black Soga.
  • BUNNYEARS - Redeem this code to get Bunny Ears.
  • MP - Redeem this code to get Alt Defenders = Mid plate.
  • DRP - Redeem this code to get a Blue Card.
  • TRP - Redeem this code to get a Water Bar.
  • 876 - Redeem this code to get a Blue Hood.
  • TOD - Redeem this code to get a Health Bar.
  • LKY - Redeem this code to get a Green Sword.
  • R3DD - Redeem this code to get a Red Scythe.
  • NYAW - Redeem this code to get a Blue Hat with Horns
  • 404 - Redeem this code to get a Blue Item
  • RIP - Redeem this code to get a Tiger Hat
  • HDN - Redeem this code to get a Dragon Hat
  • SWD - Redeem this code to get Blue Hood
  • 707 - Redeem this code to get Purple Antlers
  • rainglowb - Redeem this code to get Sapphire War Axe
  • Gel - Redeem this code to get Purple Devil Horns
  • DISCORD.GG/CAC - Redeem this code to get Messy Summer Boy Hair
  • ANOTHERCODEWOOO - Redeem this code to get Messy Y2K
  • THANKYOUGUYS - Redeem this code to get Hair
  • REDVALK - Redeem this code to get Reevalk Decal
  • RAINBOW - Redeem this code to get Rainglowb.
  • SKULL - Redeem this code to get Skull.
  • TRICKORTREAT - Redeem this code to get Trick Or Treat Head.
  • THISISAINFSTOCKJAMCODE - Redeem this code to get Jam Fedora.
  • Headphones - Redeem this code to get Cat Burger Pods.
  • Tie - Redeem this code to get Tie.
  • Hat - Redeem this code to get The Neon Tophat of Doom.
  • Cowboy Hat - Redeem this code to get Max.
  • Roblox - Redeem this code to get Star Shades.
  • Poke - Redeem this code to get Purple Noir Valkyrie.
  • Doom - Redeem this code to get Relaxing Pepper.
  • Love - Redeem this code to get Hammer of Friends.
  • Shock - Redeem this code to get DartSky’s Top Hat.

Expired UGC Limited Codes

Currently, there are no expired UGC Limited codes, so redeem the active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

How to Redeem Codes for UGC Limited

Just like in most other Roblox games, redeeming UGC Limited codes is not difficult, and it is just one of the few actions you can do here. However, if you encounter any difficulties or something doesn't work properly, follow these instructions to figure out what to do:

  • Launch UGC Limited .
  • Pay attention to the top of the screen. There will be a button that says UGC CODES. Click on it.
  • This will open a new menu. There will be two big buttons. Among them, interact with the second one, which says Redeem Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a white Redeem button below it. Now, enter manually or, better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the white Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification “Code successfully redeemed” and the limited UGC will appear on your screen.

How to Get More UGC Limited Codes

To find more Roblox codes, you'll need to follow creators who use UGC Limited as a tool to promote their UGC. Considering that the audience engagement in this experience is quite high, you can easily find a content maker whose stuff you like and get a code, or become a UGC creator yourself and share it with others.

item.title: Warframe Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Warframe Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Warframe
  • Warframe Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Shooting Games Like Warframe
  • About the Warframe Developers

Warframe is a free-to-play sci-fi action game. It actually feels like the developers worked really hard on the game, as they have thought of many features, including customization items. Below are plenty of Warframe codes for freebies as Glyphs skins and others.

Updated August 16, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are several Warframe codes active right now, offering both a decoration and a wide range of glyphs. These rewards let you personalize your game in different ways, so it’s worth picking them up while they’re available. Since codes can expire without warning, you may want to redeem them sooner rather than later. More glyphs or items could be added later, so check back here for future updates.

Warframe Codes

Below, fans will find all the codes for Warframe, including a lot of Glyph codes. In the game, Glyphs are special images that players can use to personalize their profile or to distribute in the game. Glyphs can be placed on certain surfaces in the game, such as the walls of a player's base, or used as a profile picture.

How to Redeem Codes in Warframe

The process of redeeming codes is not as easy as one would expect since it is different from most other games. Therefore, if players have any difficulties, the step-by-step instructions below will help them:

  • First, visit the official promo code page on the Warframe website.
  • Then, players need to log in to their Warframe account.
  • Afterward, they should enter or copy the above-mentioned code in the Promo Code field.
  • To redeem the code, click the Submit Code button.

Warframe Tips and Tricks

  • Platinum Strategy: Invest the initial 50 platinum wisely, focusing on weapon and Warframe slots for efficient gear management.
  • Mastery Rank: Increase Mastery Rank by leveling gear and completing Mastery Tests.
  • Star Chart Priority: Systematically conquer Star Chart missions before venturing into open-world areas for better rewards later on.
  • Trading Tactics: Engage in trading when a platinum discount is available, and rely on Warframe Market for fair transactions, avoiding trade chat as a beginner.
  • Nightwave Rewards: Participate in Nightwave challenges for valuable items and rank advancement.
  • Syndicate Support: Join syndicates for passive reputation gains and rewards.
  • Endo Management: Spend Endo wisely, choosing essential mods over others.
  • Premium Assistance: Consider premium boosts for faster progression, especially if time is limited.

About the Warframe Developers

Warframe was created by the developers from Digital Extremes. This Canadian team has been making games since 1993 and has more than 200 workers. Here are some of their titles:

  • Unreal Tournament
  • Epic Pinball
  • Dark Sector
  • The Darkness II
  • Soulframe
